speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Is he at Master Ford’s already, think’st

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: thou?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Sure he is by this, or will be presently.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: But truly he is very courageous mad about

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: his throwing into the water. Mistress Ford desires

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: you to come suddenly.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: I’ll be with her by and by. I’ll but bring

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: my young man here to school.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Look where his master comes. ’Tis a playing day, I

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: see.—How now, Sir Hugh, no school today?

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: No. Master Slender is let the boys leave to

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: play.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Blessing of his heart!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Sir Hugh, my husband says my son

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: profits nothing in the world at his book. I pray you,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: ask him some questions in his accidence.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Come hither, William. Hold up your head.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Come.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Come on, sirrah. Hold up your head.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Answer your master. Be not afraid.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: William, how many numbers is in nouns?

speaker: WILLIAM
text: Two.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Truly, I thought there had been one

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: number more, because they say “ ’Od’s nouns.”

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Peace your tattlings!—What is “fair,”

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: William?

speaker: WILLIAM
text: Pulcher.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Polecats? There are fairer things

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: than polecats, sure.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: You are a very simplicity ’oman. I pray you,

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: peace.—What is lapis, William?

speaker: WILLIAM
text: A stone.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: And what is “a stone,” William?

speaker: WILLIAM
text: A pebble.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: No. It is lapis. I pray you, remember in your

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: prain.

speaker: WILLIAM
text: Lapis.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: That is a good William. What is he, William,

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: that does lend articles?

speaker: WILLIAM
text: Articles are borrowed of the pronoun and be

speaker: WILLIAM
text: thus declined: singulariter, nominativo, hic, haec,

speaker: WILLIAM
text: hoc.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Nominativo, hig, haeg, hog. Pray you, mark:

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: genitivo, huius. Well, what is your accusative case?

speaker: WILLIAM
text: Accusativo, hinc.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: I pray you, have your remembrance, child.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Accusativo, hung, hang, hog.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: “Hang-hog” is Latin for bacon, I

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: warrant you.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Leave your prabbles, ’oman.—What is the

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: focative case, William?

speaker: WILLIAM
text: O—vocativo—O—

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Remember, William, focative is caret.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: And that’s a good root.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: ’Oman, forbear.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Peace!

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: What is your genitive case plural, William?

speaker: WILLIAM
text: Genitive case?

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Ay.

speaker: WILLIAM
text: Genitive: horum, harum, horum.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Vengeance of Ginny’s case! Fie on

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: her! Never name her, child, if she be a whore.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: For shame, ’oman!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: You do ill to teach the child such

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: words.—He teaches him to hick and to hack,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: which they’ll do fast enough of themselves, and to

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: call “whorum.”—Fie upon you!

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: ’Oman, art thou lunatics? Hast thou no understandings

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: for thy cases and the numbers of the

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: genders? Thou art as foolish Christian creatures as

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: I would desires.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Prithee, hold thy

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: peace.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Show me now, William, some declensions of

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: your pronouns.

speaker: WILLIAM
text: Forsooth, I have forgot.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: It is qui, quae, quod. If you forget your qui’s,

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: your quae’s, and your quod’s, you must be

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: preeches. Go your ways and play, go.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: He is a better scholar than I thought he

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: was.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: He is a good sprag memory. Farewell, Mistress

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Page.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Adieu, good Sir Hugh.—Get you home,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text:
boy.
                 
                (
                To
                 
                Mistress
                 
                Quickly
                .
                )
               Come. We stay too

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: long.
